content.query:
--create station dimension table
CREATE TABLE dbo.DimStation
(
    StationKey INT IDENTITY NOT NULL,
    StationAlternateKey NVARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    StationName NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Borough NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    IsHistorical BIT NULL,
    Service_Available BIT NULL
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

--create transit mode dimension table
CREATE TABLE dbo.DimTransitMode (
    TransitModeKey INT IDENTITY NOT NULL,
    TransitAlternateKey NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE dbo.FactRides (
    RideTime DATETIME NOT NULL,
    TransitModeKey INT NOT NULL,
    StationKey NVARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    
)
